content: loops single_crochet in each st around moving beg of round marker each round work until bag is approximately 12 or desired height handles lay bag flat place markers approximately 3 in from the edges on each side placing 4 markers count number of st between markers on each side single_crochet around to 1st marker *continue single crocheting around cord only but not into previous round single_crochet 2 st more than the number between the markers rejoin at next marker on bag crocheting around cord and into st of previous round up to next marker* repeat between * once more remove all markers except beg of round marker continue working 2 more rounds as with body of bag stop at marker taper end of nylon cord by for approx 1 ½ to 2 single_crochet over tapered cord to end end by joining with a slip_stitch and end off weave in tail ©2023 donna stubbs the fiber house 146 coffeen ave sheridan wy 82801 307-673-0383
